address: C. Tercera 7839, Zona Centro, 22000 Tijuana, B.C.
biography: 20/7 Gym is a staple to many locals. Located near the heart of the city, it is surrounded with a variety of accessible stores and vendors all within a walking distance. The gym itself holds a plethora of equipment including the popular three, being the squat rack.

equipment.description: Machines for all body parts (e.g. Squat Rack, Bench Press, Rows, etc.)
equipment.title: Weight Machines

equipment.description: Variety of machines for cardio (e.g. treadmill, cycles, stair master, etc.)
equipment.title: Cardio Machines

equipment.description: Access to popular supplements (e.g. Protein Powder, Creatine, BCAAs, etc.)
equipment.title: Supplements

equipment.description: Small fruit and protein smoothie bar, good for pre or post workout.
equipment.title: Protein Bar
